adoption.campaignSubtitle: Find your perfect match among our soft stars. No drama, just unconditional love.

Elvis.description: Elvis doesn't judge your drama. While emotions run high in 'Winter vol Liefde', he remains calm. He's the ideal partner for a winter walk to find your inner peace.

Micky.description: Micky is the 'lead actor' of our herd. He's curious and pokes his nose into everything. The perfect match for those who love a bit of action and humor.

Suri.description: Suri is the embodiment of elegance and 'slow travel'. No rush, only pure connection. Ideal for those who choose beauty and a deep bond with nature.

Teddy.description: Teddy is the rock of our herd. He is incredibly patient, especially with children. The ideal match for families seeking peace and stability.

Ricky.description: Ricky might be a little shy, but once he starts humming, he doesn't stop. He's the perfect companion for those who love cozy vibes and stories.

Freddy.description: Freddy knows exactly how to beg for treats with his little foot. He steals everyone's heart and brings cheer to every encounter.

stars.title: Meet Our Stars
stars.subtitle: Each with their own unique personality. Which one is perfect for you?

elvis.personality: The perfect listener. Elvis doesn't judge your drama. He stays calm while emotions run high.

micky.personality: Curious adventurer. Micky wants to discover everything and turns every walk into an expedition.

suri.personality: Gentle soul. Suri's velvety soft coat and calm character are therapeutic. Pure serenity.

teddy.personality: The calm leader. Teddy is the rock of our herd. He is incredibly patient, especially with children.
teddy.idealFor: Families with young children and peace seekers

ricky.personality: The charming hummer. Ricky might be a little shy, but once he starts humming, he doesn't stop.
ricky.idealFor: People who love cozy vibes and stories

freddy.personality: The smart charmer. Freddy knows exactly how to beg for treats with his little foot. He steals everyone's heart.
freddy.idealFor: Visitors who could use some extra cheer

micky.name: Micky
micky.character: Micky is very timid, afraid of noises and shouting.

stories.0: When Micky saw a mouse in the barn for the first time, he got scared and quickly ran away.
stories.1: Despite being timid, Micky showed incredible bravery when he helped calm a nervous child during therapy by gently approaching and staying close.

elvis.name: Elvis
elvis.character: Elvis is stubborn and rebellious. He's curious and often acts like a star.

stories.0: Elvis can jump very high, so once he jumped over the fence and ran into the forest. Fortunately, he came back after a short time.
stories.1: During one therapy session, Elvis started humming along when a visitor was singing, living up to his namesake as a true performer!

ricky.name: Ricky
ricky.character: Ricky is very shy, but he's the biggest chatterbox.

stories.0: Ricky came to us as a visitor, but he became such good friends with Elvis that he stayed.
stories.1: One rainy day, Ricky discovered he loves playing in puddles and now does a happy dance whenever it rains.

teddy.name: Teddy
teddy.character: Teddy is the leader of the herd. He is known for his calm demeanor and friendly nature.

stories.0: Teddy let a 2-year-old girl take him for a walk.
stories.1: During a stormy night, Teddy stood guard over the younger alpacas, showing his true leadership qualities.

suri.name: Suri
suri.character: Suri is very brave, which often leads him to try to dominate the herd.

stories.0: Suri isn't afraid of anything and once spat on Daisy.
stories.1: When we introduced new hay feeders, Suri was the first to figure out how to use them and showed the others.

freddy.name: Freddy
freddy.character: Freddy has a changeable character - sometimes he can snort at guests.

stories.0: Freddy is very intelligent. He quickly learned to ask for food with his foot.
stories.1: During winter, Freddy discovered he loves catching snowflakes with his tongue, making everyone laugh at his playful antics.

lucy.name: Lucy
lucy.character: Lucy is an energetic and loving Yorkshire Terrier. Despite her small size, she has a big personality and loves to keep watch over the farm.

stories.0: Lucy may be tiny, but she takes her job as farm guardian very seriously.
stories.1: She's incredibly gentle with visitors and loves to show them around the farm.

daisy.name: Daisy
daisy.memoriam: Always in our hearts, watching over the alpacas from her favorite spot in the garden.
daisy.character: Daisy was a sweet and friendly dog who loved attention. She's now our guardian angel in the garden.

stories.0: Daisy had a special bond with the baby goats and often watched over them.
stories.1: She is deeply missed by everyone at the farm, especially her alpaca friends.

molly.name: Molly
molly.character: Molly is very loving and playful. She bounces around the garden looking for children to play with.

stories.0: Despite being a newcomer, Molly has already won the hearts of all the farm visitors.
stories.1: She loves chasing bubbles and playing hide and seek in the high grass.

madonna.name: Madonna
madonna.character: Madonna is the diva of the goat herd. She loves attention and often 'sings' to visitors.

stories.0: Madonna once stole a visitor's hat and wore it around the farm for an entire day.
stories.1: She has a habit of standing on the highest point of any structure, as if posing for a photo shoot.

ladygaga.name: Lady Gaga
ladygaga.character: Lady Gaga is known for her unique 'fashion sense', often found wearing flowers or leaves in her fur.

stories.0: Lady Gaga once organized a 'goat parade' where she led the entire herd in a line around the farm.
stories.1: She has a special talent for finding the tastiest leaves and will share them with her goat friends.

nella.name: Nella
nella.character: Nella is the gentle soul of the group. She's particularly good with children and loves cuddles.

stories.0: Nella once comforted a crying child by nuzzling up to them and staying by their side until they smiled.
stories.1: She has a unique friendship with one of the farm cats and they can often be found napping together in the sun.

baron.name: Baron
baron.character: Baron is the dignified leader of the goat herd. He's calm, wise, and protective of the others.

stories.0: Baron once alerted the farmers to a broken fence by repeatedly headbutting the barn door until someone came to check.
stories.1: He has a unique habit of 'escorting' visitors around the farm, walking beside them like a tour guide.
